:_mod-docs-content-type: PROCEDURE
[id="procedure"]
= A procedure

Do something.

.Prerequisites

* You have installed the OpenShift CLI (`oc`).

* You have logged in as a user with `cluster-admin` privileges.

.Procedure

. Unwrap the thing.

. Build the thing.
+
[source,terminal]
----
$ build thing
----
+
.Example output
[source,terminal]
----
succeeded!
----

. Release the thing.

.Verification

Verify the thing by looking at it.
